document_data.mainbody:
eirdre Gallaway was running the Gallaway Trade Depot in Targos, in the early 14 century DR.
Deirdre was a young woman with fiery red hair and a fiery heart. She inherited her grandfathers â€“ Ilmus Gallaways hot temper.
Deidres shop, Gallaway Trade Depot, stood atop a cliff in Targos, overlooking the towns docks and the coasters warehouses. Her inventory included several unique and common enchanted items, as well as weapons, armor, pelts, alcohol, iron rations, lumber, and many other trade goods.
Deirdre Gallaway was a young and ambitious member of the Gallaway Coaster, daughter to Rawleigh Gallaway, and granddaughter of Ilmus Gallaway of Easthaven. Shortly before the , Deirdre was sent to run the Gallaway Trade Depot in Targos with aid and council from Jemeliah, her fathers loyal friend and employee. Deirdres ambitions, however, were cut short by the grim reality of war. That year, the Legion of the Chimera targeted the Ten Towns and besieged Targos, costing the coaster profit and forcing Deidre to provide the town with weapons and lumber on credit with some persuasion by the Speaker Lord Ulbrec Dinnesmore. The loss of income embittered young woman, causing tensions between the coaster and the leadership of Targos.
